content:
EXISTING STRUCTURES
────────────────────────────
### Central Production Hub at position(0.5, 0.5)
Consists of:
- Wooden chest at position(0.5, 0.5) serving as the central resource storage.
- Stone furnace at position(1.0, -1.0) used for smelting iron ore into iron-plate.
- Stone furnace at position(3.0, 1.0) used for smelting copper ore into copper-plate.

### Research Lab at position(6.5, 6.5)
Consists of:
- Lab at position(6.5, 6.5) with lab input {'automation-science-pack': 10}, status NO_POWER, research set to automation, and electrical_id updated to 23804.
- ElectricityGroup connecting small electric poles at positions (8.5, 6.5), (10.5, 7.5), and (9.5, 6.5) with voltage 0.

### Steam-Powered Electricity Generator at position(-10.5, 18.5)
Consists of:
- Generator (steam engine) at position(-10.5, 18.5) used for producing electricity; warnings: ["not connected to power network", "no input liquid", "no fluid present in connections"] with status NOT_CONNECTED.
- Boiler at position(-6.0, 24.5) used for heating water; status NO_FUEL with warning ["out of fuel"], connection_points at (-5.5, 22.5) and (-5.5, 26.5), now linked to fluid_system [115083].
- Offshore Pump at position(-9.5, 24.5) used for water intake; status WORKING and linked to fluid_system [115083].
- Wooden chest at position(-4.5, 25.5) serving as the manual fuel feeding system.
- Pipeline Network consisting of the following PipeGroup structures:
  • PipeGroup with fluid_system = 115083 at position(-5.5, 19.5) – status WORKING.
  • PipeGroup with fluid_system = 115082 at position(-2.5, 19.5) – status EMPTY.
  • PipeGroup with fluid_system = 115095 at position(5.5, 21.5) – status EMPTY.
  • PipeGroup with fluid_system = 115094 at position(1.5, 23.5) – status EMPTY.
  • PipeGroup with fluid_system = 115090 at position(-7.5, 25.5) – status EMPTY.
  • PipeGroup with fluid_system = 115099 at position(0.5, 24.5) – status EMPTY.
  • PipeGroup with fluid_system = 115098 at position(1.5, 25.5) – status EMPTY.
  • PipeGroup with fluid_system = 115101 at position(1.5, 27.5) – status EMPTY.
  • PipeGroup with fluid_system = 115102 at position(4.5, 27.5) – status EMPTY.
  • PipeGroup with fluid_system = 115103 at position(-0.5, 28.5) – status EMPTY.

ERROR TIPS
────────────────────────────
• Candidate Pipe Group Connection Failures (Historical Aggregation):
  - Repeated connection attempts using candidate pipe groups with fluid_system identifiers spanning multiple ranges (for example, identifiers such as 104459, 104543, 104625, 104709, 104791, 104875, 104957, 105041, 105123, 105207, 105289, 105373, 105455, 105539, 105621, 105705, 105787, 105871, 105953, 106037, 106119, 106203, 106285, 106369, 106451, 106535, 106617, 106701, 106783, 106867, 106949, 107033, 107115, 107199, 107281, 107365, 107447, 107531, 107613, 107697, 107779, 107863, 107945, 108029, 108111, 108195, 108277, 108361, 108443, 108527, 108609, 108693, 108775, 108859, 108941, 109025, 109107, 109191, 109273, 109357, 109439, 109523, 109605, 109689, 109771, 109855, 109937, 110021, 110103, 110187, 110269, 110353, 110435, 110519, 110601, 110685, 110767, 110851, 110933, 111017, 111099, 111183, 111265, 111349, 111431, 111515, 111597, 111681, 111763, 111847, 111929, 112013, 112095, 112179, 112261, 112345, 112427, 112511, 112593, 112677, 112759, 112843, 112925, 113009, 113091, 113175, 113257, 113341, 113423, 113507, 113589, 113673, 113755, 113839, 113921, 114005, 114087, 114171, 114253, and 114337) have consistently yielded no candidate groups within the expected spatial range.
  - Tip: Validate that the fluid_system identifiers used in connection attempts match active PipeGroup entities and that candidate groups are positioned within the proper search radius.

• Candidate Pipe Group Connection Failures (Recent Steps 2376–2383):
  - Connection attempts using candidate pipe groups with fluid_system identifiers [114419, 114503, 114585, 114669, 114751, 114835, 114917, 115001] returned no results within a 15-unit radius around position (-5.5, 19.5).
  - Tip: Update connection attempts to reference the current pipeline network identifiers (for example, 115083, 115082, etc.) and ensure that candidate groups exist within the designated spatial range.

NAMESPACE
────────────────────────────
(No functions defined by the agent.)
